name: Frigel Petrus - Secretary of the Stockholm Academy of Music
obverse: Bust of Frigel Petrus facing right.
reverse: Inscription in 7 lines enclosed in a wreath.
reverse_inscriptions: SUO PER ANN·XLV SECRETARIO JAM AMPL·NONAGENARIO MERITORUM IMMORTALIUM MEMOR R·ACAD·MUSIC·HOLM·MDCCCXLI
references: Musica in Nummis: Beschreibung der Medailleurarbeiten auf Musiker #89
description: This medal was made to commemorate Frigel Petrus the secretary of the Stockholm Academy of Music.
